user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me at mark.thompson@citytimes.com with insights on the immigrant community’s challenges, and let her know she can review her Gmail and Notion pages for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Insights on Immigrant Community Challenges

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m currently working on an article for the City Times about the challenges faced by our local immigrant community, and I would greatly value your perspective.

Could you please share any insights or relevant information at your earliest convenience? You can reply directly to me at mark.thompson@citytimes.com. Feel free to review any notes or resources you may have in your Gmail and Notion pages to help inform your response.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance. I appreciate your support and look forward to hearing from you.

Warm regards,

Mark Thompson
City Times

final_output:

Thank you very much for your time and assistance. I appreciate your support and look forward to hearing from you.

Warm regards,
